text: Jean Douchet (; 19 January 1929 - 21 November 2019) was a French movie director, historian, movie critic and teacher. He began his career in the early 1950s at Gazette du Cinéma and Cahiers du cinema with members of the future French New Wave.Jean Douchet L'homme cinéma, Écriture, Paris, 2014. Douchet died on 21 November 2019 in Paris at the age of 90.Legendary French Film Critic Jean Douchet Dies at 90 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French movie directors Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie critics Category:French historians Category:Academics of Paris universities Category:People from Pas- de-Calais
title: Jean Douchet
